FuncDef: The reset ppp statistics command clears statistics about PPP packets and authentication messages.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about PPP packets and authentication messages on a board in a specified slot.
-

Clears statistics about PPP packets and authentication messages on a specified interface. interface-type interface-number specifies the interface type and number.
-

Clears statistics about PPP packets and authentication messages on a specified interface. interface-type interface-number specifies the interface type and number.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you need to collect statistics about PPP packets and authentication messages over a period of time, run the reset ppp statistics command to clear the existing statistics beforehand.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
After the reset ppp statistics command is run, the statistics about PPP packets and authentication messages are cleared and cannot be restored. Exercise caution when running the command.
